landing.title: Your Trusted Healthcare Companion
landing.subtitle: Book appointments with top doctors, get medical advice, and manage your health effortlessly. Your well-being is just a click away!

info.findDoctorsTitle: Find Trusted Doctors & Book Appointments Instantly
info.findDoctorsSubtitle: Skip long waiting times and book consultations with top-rated doctors in just a few clicks.
info.whyChooseText: We connect you with certified doctors, ensuring hassle-free appointments, medical record tracking, and easy access to healthcare.
info.howItWorksSubtitle: Easy & Quick Steps to Get the Care You Need
info.howItWorksText: Find specialists, choose a time that fits your schedule, and get expert medical advice from the comfort of your home.
info.manageAppointmentsSubtitle: Keep Track of Your Consultations Anytime
info.manageAppointmentsText: View your upcoming visits, receive reminders, and access your consultation history in one place.
